program main

  implicit none

  integer :: x, result, n, ans, i, k

  ! Read input
  read(*,*) x

  ! Compute first program's result
  if (x ==1) then
     result =0
  else
     result =1
  end if

  ! Now compute second program's part
  n = result
  ans =0

  do i=1, n
     k = n / i
     ans = ans + i * k * (k +1)/2
  end do

  !
children.label: code_analysis

children.text:

  print*, ans

end program main
